Posts.Content: Hi, I’m 70 years old and have been diagnosed with with Stage 3 Invasive Triple Negative Breast Cancer . The lump I found on 12th November, it’s taken all this time to get sorted. I’m due surgery this Monday 11th March for lumpectomy. I have no idea what Â other treatment to expect after. I feel I have been messed about so much on my hospital visits. have you any info for me.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy done
